cast.name: 约翰·劳埃德·扬 John Lloyd Young

writer.name: 叶甫根尼·阿芬尼夫斯基 Evgeny Afineevsky

this_title: Oy Vey! My Son Is Gay!!
introduction: Oy Vey My Son is Gay is a new romantic comedy featuring a Jewish family who struggles coming to terms with their sons non-Jewish and gay boyfriend, and the other families difficulty accepting their own son, both families hide it, but in the end when the couple adopts a child and it makes headline news, they come to defend the couple and realize how much they love them.Best of all their are some fun faces as cast members: Lainie Kazan, Saul Rubinek, Vincent Pastore, John Lloyd Young, Jai Rodriguez, Bruce Vilanch, Shelly Burch, Slava Medvedenko and Carmen Electra.
foreign_title: Oy Vey! My Son Is Gay!!
